name: Orion
description: Orion's Armor is a set of multiplayer bonus armor originally only obtainable by pre-ordering The Mythological Heroes Pack (a pack that also included Achilles' Armor, Perseus' Armor, and Odysseus' Armor) for God of War: Ascension, but has since been made into DLC. Stats[] Rank 1 - +1 Health; +3% Elemental Power Rank 2 - +2 Health; +4% Elemental Power Rank 3 - +3 Health; +5% Elemental Power Experience[] Rank 1 - n/a Rank 2 - 3,500 XP Rank 3 - 12,000 XP Gallery[]
